title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, embed via npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client on PyPI; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains/agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker, supports multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and model switcher.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming, and embedding support; on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, embed with configurable timeouts.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET Standard 2.0 client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-sk (Semantic Kernel)
summary: Microsoft Semantic Kernel connector enabling Ollama models for planners, chat, and text completion.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with Ollama, GPU runtime, WebUI, and monitoring via Prometheus/Grafana.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + Streamlit demo.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into threads with slash commands and model picker.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin to run local LLM prompts on journal entries and summarize linked references.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code explanation, generation, and refactoring via Ollama.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a shared backend for multiple IDEs/tools.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official Modelfile library (Llama 3, Phi-3, CodeGemma, Mistral…) with community contributions.
